definition: lingering sound
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
surname Yu
(archaic) I/me/variant of 餘|余[yu2], surplus
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
reverberates around the rafters (idiom); fig. sonorous and resounding (esp. of singing voice)

sentences.english: Only the residual sounds of the bell remain.
sentences.chinese: 只留下鸽铃那袅袅的余音。

sentences.english: It is sound and sound, can be re circulation.
sentences.chinese: 余音终究是余音，能循环不能重来。

sentences.english: It is sound and sound, can be re circulation.
sentences.chinese: 余音终究是余音，能循环不能重来。

sentences.english: If your resolution is buzzing through your head, it’s easier to stick to it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的决心“余音绕梁”，那么就更容易坚持。

sentences.english: But Iraq isn’t going to leave the U.S. Army.
sentences.chinese: 然而，伊拉克的余音却会一直萦绕在美国陆军周围。

sentences.english: Now the carol of peace and prosperity prevails in the vast land of the Northern Anhui.
sentences.chinese: 盛世欢歌，飘荡在皖北大地上，余音绕梁。

sentences.english: The conflict — and its Cold War echoes — continued to play out on the international stage. The leaders of five former Soviet bloc states spoke out against Russian domination at a rally in Tbilisi.
sentences.chinese: 这次冲突和冷战的余音一起，继续影响着国际政局。
我是来自梅城初中的余音。

sentences.english: Lingering song makes it last for 10 rounds instead of 5.
sentences.chinese: 绕梁余音可以让效果持续10轮而非5轮。

sentences.english: But echoes of the trial would reverberate in American literature.
sentences.chinese: 但审判的余音却一直回荡在美国文学史中。

definition: reverberates around the rafters (idiom); fig. sonorous and resounding (esp. of singing voice)
melodious/mellifluous
variant of 迴響|回响[hui2 xiang3]
to echo/to reverberate/to respond/echo/response/reaction
(phonetics) voiceless sound
to resound/to reverberate/to echo
reverberates around the rafters for three days (idiom); fig. sonorous and resounding (esp. of singing voice)
pleasant lingering effect/memorable stylishness/haunting tune/aftertaste (of a good wine etc)
hanging by a thread/very precarious/almost extinct/(of sound) linger on faintly
ears
echo/reply/turn (ornament in music)
musical note/tone
lit. as if weeping and complaining (idiom)/fig. mournful (music or singing)
reverberates around the rafters (idiom); fig. sonorous and resounding (esp. of singing voice)
singing voice/fig. original voice of a poet
deep and somber/see also 窈窈[yao3 yao3]
sweet-sounding/beautiful (of sound)
